title: Spacious Fabulous House in North Hollywood
posting_body: Spacious Fabulous House in North Hollywood.
Amenities included: central air, central heat, dishwasher, hardwood floors, stainless steel appliance, storage, and washer dryer.
Contact by email/messaging is please, and additionally feel free to leave a voicemail.
Voicemail - Feel free to leave a voicemail if you have questions and would like to request a tour.
Email - Please note that before any tour we require candidates to answer a few verification questions over email before we move forward.
We will send you the questions that are needed to indicate that you are a qualified candidate.
Please do not reach out if you do not meet the following requirements and you may not receive a response if you do not qualify.
Note, these are some but not all of the requirements: We require a 700 credit score and we allow a minimal amount of pets that are under 35 pounds.
Feel free to include any questions and if you qualify we will discuss touring availability.
If we allow you to apply there will be thorough background checks.
Note, there is a 450 SF backhouse on this property that is not included as part of this listing.
